channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: How to watch Pope Francis's funeral, and what to expect
item.description: Pope Francis's funeral begins in Vatican City at 4 a.m. ET on Saturday and will end with his burial in Rome. Here's what to know about the day's event...

item.title: Fears of racial profiling swirl over registration policy for immigrants in the US illegally

item.description: Authorities confirm the general, Yaroslav Moskalik, was part of the Russian delegation for the 2015 Minsk agreements.

item.title: Pope Francis's funeral: A visual guide

item.title: Sudanese eating charcoal and leaves to survive, aid agency warns
item.description: People are trekking under "blistering" heat to escape "horrific circumstances", the BBC is told.

item.title: George Santos in court for sentencing on Long Island
item.description: George Santos faces sentencing today on Long Island after pleading guilty to federal wire fraud and identity theft.

item.title: "Bone collector" caterpillar disguises itself in the remains of its prey
item.description: There are other meat-eating caterpillars that "do lots of crazy things, but this takes the cake," the study's author said.

item.title: Ukraine may have to temporarily give up land for peace, Kyiv Mayor Klitschko tells BBC
item.description: Vitali Klitschko tells the BBC that although unfair, it could be a temporary solution to end the fighting.
